name: Fact-o-Fact
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fact o fact
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The purpose is to make people know about the facts and develop a habit of listening to facts.
The features are:
1] It tells you facts.
2] Make you aware of something unusual
3] Their are about 10 facts.

It works by saying "Alexa, open fact o fact." It displays a fact simultanously after saying.
It tells you one fact and then you need to repeat the process again to listen to different facts.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
